data.title: Directed by John Ford: Director’s Cut
data.meta_description: Established in 1972, Quad Cinema is New York's original multi-screen cinema.
data.text:
Orson Welles narrates Bogdanovich’s acclaimed documentary on John Ford, an acclaimed documentarian better known as the man with the most Academy Awards for Best Director.Classic clips complement Bogdanovich’s sit-downs with the storied filmmaker himself; with famed collaborators such as John Wayne and Maureen O’Hara; and with admiring directors including Steven Spielberg and Martin Scorsese.

Introduced by Peter Bogdanovich
